mapper.select: select id, company_id,name, principal, address, telephone, description, type, num_system1, num_system2, num_system3, insert_time, update_time, insert_user, update_user from tb_company where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_company(company_id, principal, address, telephone, description, type, num_system1, num_system2, num_system3, insert_time, update_time, insert_user, update_user,name) values (#{companyId}, #{principal.id}, #{address}, #{telephone}, #{description}, #{type}, #{numSystem1}, #{numSystem2}, #{numSystem3}, now(), now(), #{insertUser.id}, #{updateUser.id},#{name})

insert into tb_company(company_id, principal, address, telephone, description, type, num_system1, num_system2, num_system3, insert_time, update_time ,update_user ,insert_user) values
(#{entity.companyId}, #{entity.principal.id}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.telephone}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.numSystem1}, #{entity.numSystem2}, #{entity.numSystem3}, #{entity.insertTime}, #{entity.updateTime} , #{entity.updateUser.id}) , #{entity.insertUser.id})

insert into tb_company(company_id, principal, address, telephone, description, type, num_system1, num_system2, num_system3, insert_time, update_time,insert_user, update_user) values
(#{entity.companyId}, #{entity.principal.id}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.telephone}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.numSystem1}, #{entity.numSystem2}, #{entity.numSystem3}, #{entity.insertTime}, #{entity.updateTime} , #{entity.updateUser.id}) , #{entity.insertUser.id})
on duplicate key update company_id = values(company_id), principal = values(principal.id), address = values(address), telephone = values(telephone), description = values(description), type = values(type), num_system1 = values(num_system1), num_system2 = values(num_system2), num_system3 = values(num_system3), insert_time = values(insert_time), update_time = values(update_time) update_user = values(update_user.id) insert_user = values(insert_user.id),)
mapper.update:
update tb_company
company_id = #{companyId},
principal = #{principal.id},
address = #{address},
telephone = #{telephone},
description = #{description},
type = #{type},
num_system1 = #{numSystem1},
num_system2 = #{numSystem2},
num_system3 = #{numSystem3},
insert_time = #{insertTime},
insert_user = #{insertUser.id},
update_user = #{updateUser.id},
update_time = now()
where id = #{id}
